description: Extracts billing data for the current period. Typically the first step in the process.
Loads pre-generated billing or simulation data from S3 into an ephemeral environment, used when BillingExtract is skipped.
Uploads RPA user mappings and configurations before running VB or TPB simulations.
Runs VB simulation — requires RPA User Upload and either BillingExtract or LoadFromS3Ephemeral.
Runs TPB simulation — requires either BillingExtract or LoadFromS3Ephemeral.
Uploads results to the RPA system after successful VB simulation.
Sweeps processed records and synchronizes them with the internal repository after RPA upload.
Updates customer and billing information in Zuora prior to posting.
Posts finalized billing transactions to Zuora after updates are complete.
Runs after sweep and posting to reconcile data between RPA outputs and Zuora entries.
